title: For Recruiters | Applicant Network
description: Join Applicant Network to access a pool of engaged, pre-qualified candidates who opted in to be found. Built-in messaging, pipeline tracking, and split-fee integration included.
author: Applicant Network

blocks.subtitle: Applicant Network gives recruiters direct access to a pool of engaged, pre-qualified candidates. No cold outreach, no resume parsing from job boards. Every candidate on this platform opted in.
blocks.imageAlt: Recruiter reviewing candidate profiles on a modern analytics dashboard

blocks.heading: A Candidate Pool That Actually Engages
paragraphs: Most recruiting tools put you in front of passive candidates — people who may or may not respond, who uploaded a resume to a database years ago and haven't touched it since. Applicant Network is built on a different premise.

Every candidate here created an active profile. They set their preferences, uploaded current materials, and are checking for matched opportunities. When you reach out, you're not interrupting — you're delivering what they asked for. That changes the entire dynamic of a conversation.

blocks.heading: Profiles Built for Recruiters to Use
paragraphs: Candidates complete structured profiles covering skills, experience, salary expectations, and job preferences. You see the relevant detail before your first message — no preliminary screening call required.

items.title: Structured Profiles
items.body: Skills, experience, salary band, and availability — organized for rapid evaluation.

items.title: Preference-Matched
items.body: Search by role type, location, remote preference, and compensation range. Filter once, review relevant results.

items.title: Opt-In Visibility
items.body: Candidates control their visibility. When they show up in your search, they're open to contact.

blocks.imageAlt: Structured candidate profile showing skills, experience, and job preferences

blocks.quote: The quality of candidates on Applicant Network is unlike anything I've seen on a traditional job board. Every profile I open is current, complete, and from someone who actually wants to hear from me.

items.question: Is there a cost to join as a recruiter?
items.answer: Recruiter accounts are free to create. Access to the full candidate database and messaging tools is included with any active Splits Network subscription, or available as a standalone plan.

items.question: How is this different from LinkedIn or a job board?
items.answer: Job boards aggregate resumes from people who may not be actively seeking. LinkedIn requires cold outreach with no signal on intent. On Applicant Network, every candidate created a profile specifically to be found by recruiters — and set their preferences for the kind of roles they want.

items.question: Can I post roles directly on the platform?
items.answer: Yes. Roles posted on Splits Network appear as matched opportunities in candidates' feeds on Applicant Network. You manage everything from a single dashboard.

items.question: What does the split-fee integration mean for me?
items.answer: If you specialize in a particular niche, you can submit candidates to open split-fee roles posted by other recruiters — and earn a portion of the placement fee. Applicant Network is your candidate source; Splits Network is where those candidates get matched to opportunities.

items.question: How do I know a candidate is actually interested in moving?
items.answer: Candidates set an availability status — actively looking, open to opportunities, or not available. You can filter by this status, so you're only reaching people who want to hear from you.
